name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: General We operate membership warehouses and e-commerce sites based on the concept that offering low prices on a limited selection of nationally-branded and private-label products in a wide range of categories will produce high sales volumes and rapid inventory turnover.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: When combined with the operating efficiencies achieved by volume purchasing, efficient distribution and reduced handling of merchandise in no-frills, self-service warehouse facilities, these volumes and turnover enable us to operate profitably at significantly lower gross margins (net sales less merchandise costs) than most other retailers.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: We often sell inventory before we are required to pay for it, even while taking advantage of early payment discounts.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: We buy most of our merchandise directly from suppliers and route it to cross-docking consolidation points (depots) or directly to our warehouses.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: Our depots receive large shipments from suppliers and quickly ship these goods to warehouses.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: This process creates freight volume and handling efficiencies, lowering

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: costs associated with traditional multiple-step distribution channels. Our e-commerce operations ship merchandise through our depots and logistics operations, as well as through drop-ship and other delivery arrangements with our suppliers.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: Our average warehouse space is approximately 147,000 square feet, with newer units being slightly larger.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: Floor plans are designed for efficiency in the use of selling space, the handling of merchandise, and the control of inventory.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: Because shoppers are attracted principally by the quality of merchandise and low prices, our warehouses are not elaborate.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: By strictly controlling the entrances and exits and using a membership format, we believe our inventory losses (shrinkage) are well below those of typical retail operations.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: Our operating hours are shorter than many other retailers, and due to other efficiencies inherent in a warehouse club operation, we believe labor costs are lower relative to the volume of sales.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: In the U.S., we recently added exclusive shopping hours for our Executive members and our gasoline operations generally have extended hours.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: Merchandise is generally stored on racks above the sales floor and displayed on pallets containing large quantities, reducing labor required.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: In general, with variations by country, our warehouses accept certain credit cards, including Costco co-branded cards, debit cards, cash and checks, Executive member 2% reward certificates, co-brand cardholder rebates, and our proprietary stored-value card (shop card).

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: Our strategy is to provide our members with a broad range of high-quality merchandise at prices we believe are consistently lower than elsewhere.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: We seek to limit most items to fast-selling models, sizes, and colors.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: We carry less than 4,000 active stock keeping units (SKUs) per warehouse in our core warehouse business, significantly less than other broadline retailers.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: We average from 9,000 to 10,000 SKUs online, some of which are available in our warehouses.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: Many consumable products are offered for sale in case, carton, or multiple-pack quantities only.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: To promote member satisfaction, we generally accept returns of merchandise.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: On certain electronic items, we have a 90-day return policy and provide, free of charge, technical support services, as well as an extended warranty.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: Additional third-party warranty coverage is sold on certain electronic items and major appliances.

sentence: Human Capital "Take Care of Our Employees," is a key component of our code of ethics and is fundamental to our commitment to "Take Care of Our Members."

sentence: Employee Base At the end of 2025, we employed 341,000 employees worldwide. Approximately 95% are employed in our membership warehouses and distribution channels. Around 5% are represented by unions. We also utilize seasonal employees.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: The total number of employees by segment was: Growth and Engagement We believe that our warehouses are among the most productive in the retail industry, owing largely to the commitment and efficiency of our employees.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: We seek to provide them not merely with employment but careers.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: Many attributes of our business contribute to the objective.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: The more significant include: competitive compensation and benefits; a commitment to employee development and promoting from within; and a target ratio of at least 50% of our base being full-time employees.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: These attributes contribute to what we consider, especially for the industry, a high retention rate.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: In 2025, in the U.S. and Canada that rate was approximately 94% for employees who have been with us for at least one year.

sentence: Inclusion The commitment to "Take Care of Our Employees" includes promoting an inclusive and respectful workplace.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: We strive for an environment where all employees feel that they belong, are accepted, included, respected and supported.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: We demonstrate leadership commitment to inclusion through consistent communication, employee development and education, support of diversity and inclusion initiatives within the organization, community involvement, and supplier inclusion.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: Listening to our employees is one of the ways Costco takes care of its workforce.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: In 2025, we hosted the Costco Connects meetings, its second annual Costco Connects campaign.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: These open listening sessions are an invitation for employees to talk about what is on their minds and what is impacting them both personally and professionally.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: This allows Costco leaders to engage with their employees on a deeper level and for employees to build connections with each other.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: This year we had approximately 200,000 employees participate globally.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW
sentence: Costco continues its efforts to develop future leaders, including through our supervisor in training (SIT) programs in the U.S. and Canada.

name: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORP /NEW

sentence: We compete on a worldwide basis with global, national, and regional wholesalers and retailers, including supermarkets, supercenters, online retailers, gasoline stations, hard discounters, department and specialty stores, and operators selling a single category or narrow range of merchandise.
